0010101110000011 1111110001101110 1 -> sum: 0010011111110010, cout: 1

0010010010010110 0001010100000001 0 -> sum: 0011100110010111, cout: 0

1011111110110101 0001010000010101 1 -> sum: 1101001111001011, cout: 0
0100001011000101 0100001001111100 1 -> sum: 1000010101000010, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
